name: Gastro Hero
description:
An epic quest... inside a stomach?!
A thilling, exciting... and strange adventure for a brave warrior!
Everyone's favorite...it's Gastro Hero!

◆Simple, fun controls!
・ All you have to do is tilt your device left & right!
・ Fun strategy in timing and skill!
・ Challenge the quest again and again, and compete with your friends!

◆ A range of exciting, fun characters!
・ From princesses to protagonists, everyone's a hero!
・ Collect coins to unlock new heroes!
・ Relive gaming's golden years with pixel heroes!

◆ Death lurks around every corner!
・ Enter a world where stomach acid is your greatest foe!
・ Defeat falling enemies and stay above the acidline to survive!
・ Watch out for falling dumbbells!

◆ Unleash your mighty skills!
・ Level up to unleash your mighty skills! Drop monster after monster effortlessly!
・ Harness their terrible power and aim for victory!

◇Story
A mighty dragon has appeared along with a great fissure that cuts through the wilderness.
A brave hero set out to defeat it, but got gobbled up before he even really got started.
The hero crashed down into the dragon's stomach, mere inches from being burned alive in toxic gastric acid...
Can our hero fight his way out of the dragon?!
